item.title: I Am Attacker
item.dc:creator: Chuck Orde
item.description:
When I consider the current approach the information security industry is taking to defend our assets against an ever increasing number of attackers with different motives, I can’t help but draw a comparison between this approach and the approach that was taken by Dr. Robert Neville in the 1954 science fiction novel, “I Am Legend”
